description: Dive into "Romantic Escapes in Patong Paradise" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Romantic Escapes in Patong Paradise

sources.snippet: Thai Brasserie Phuket is a contemporary Thai restaurant located on the bustling Bangla Road in Patong, Phuket. The restaurant has a cozy and intimate atmosphere with modern decor, dim lighting, and comfortable seating, making it a perfect spot for a romantic dinner. The menu features a range of traditional Thai dishes made with fresh and locally sourced ingredients.
sources.shortName: 14 Romantic Restaurants in Phuket [2025 List]

places.name: Patong Social Phuket Restaurant & Hotel - Best Indian & Thai Food

reviews.text:
The food was beyond fantastic, every bite was full of flavor, beautifully presented, and cooked to perfection. From the first dish to the last, it was a culinary delight.

What truly made this experience exceptional was the warm and welcoming service. Panday was absolutely wonderful, incredibly hospitable, attentive, and kind. You can really feel the heart and passion behind everything he does.

If you're looking for delicious food and genuine hospitality, this place is a must-visit. We will definitely be coming back!

had an amazing experience at this Indian restaurant in Phuket! The service was outstanding, and the staff were not only professional but also had such a warm and cheerful spirit that made the whole visit even more enjoyable. The location is great, and the atmosphere feels welcoming and comfortable.
The food was absolutely delicious - every dish was bursting with authentic flavors and cooked to perfection. I can honestly say it was one of the best Indian meals I've ever had.
Prices were very reasonable for the quality and portion sizes, which makes it even better. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for great food, wonderful service, and a lovely dining experience in Phuket.

My partner & myself walked past & were invited by the staff to come in. The restaurant was very appealing & clean. We were both glad to walk in because the food was authentic & amazing. We both ordered curries & both dishes including the appetisers  were extremely authentic & tasty. I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone who is thinking of coming. All staff were very friendly & helpful.

places.address: Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Amritsr Restaurant Patong is an Indian restaurant located near the entrance of the Royal Paradise Hotel in Phuket. The restaurant offers a captivating ambiance with exquisite decor, featuring indoor and outdoor seating adorned with wall-painted pictures depicting Indian rural cooking culture. While specializing in Indian cuisine and offering local beverages, some reviews suggest that the food's flavor could be improved considering the price.

sources.snippet: A restaurant with authentic Indian cuisine, located on the front line of Patong with beautiful sea views, the perfect place to have a romantic dinner overlooking a gorgeous sunset. The tables outside add even more atmosphere and is one of the guests‚Äô favorite spots. The atmosphere is that of the...
sources.shortName: The best places of the Patong district in Phuket: what to visit

places.name: Amritsr Restaurant Patong- Indian Restaurant in Phuket

reviews.text: Well first time ever having Indian food, and beyond my expectations. The portion was so generous, very tasty and rich flavour. Ram help us a lot to show how to eat and make sure we enjoyed our food so not feeling awkward. He deserves world.  Well the biryani is perfect and butter naan is my favourite so funny I say my favourite even tho it's my first time having it. Anyway hahaha it's perfect

Honestly was shocked at how good this place was.  The reviews were fantastic, but I was worried that it would be very generic chain Indian food, but it was actually awesome.  It's very authentic Punjabi cuisine with some real heat to it if you choose the spicy option.  I highly recommend this place and it has a great selection for vegetarians.

I had an amazing experience with this service, thank you to Yamada and Bindu.The delivery was prompt, and the quality of the food was outstanding. Everything was delicious and well-prepared. I highly recommend them for their great service and tasty offerings. Thank you for a wonderful meal we will definitely be back in Thailand soon to this restaurant and the view !

places.address: 1 1 1, 20 Rat Uthit Song Roi Pi Rd, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: KUDO Hotel & Beach Club is a vibrant and stylish destination located on Bang Tao Beach in Phuket. By day, guests can enjoy relaxing seaside lounging with panoramic sea views from the pool level, while at night, the club comes alive with glamorous parties featuring live music and DJ performances. With its immediate access to Bangla Road, it's an ideal choice for those seeking a high-energy atmosphere by the sea and convenient proximity to nightlife hotspots.
places.name: KUDO Hotel & Beach Club

reviews.text:
Thank you for your service,was a wonderful trip ever! good location can go to the beach by walk,staff kind and friendly good service with all those smiles made me feels like welcome home all the time ,food and beverage was amazing!!! specially seafood,sadly I didn't have chance to try all those cocktails but I definitely  come back next
year,thanks again üòä

After raising my concerns directly with the hotel management, the manager met with me and offered compensation of 50% for two nights, as well as a private taxi to the airport. The air conditioning issue has since been fixed, and I appreciate their response and willingness to address the situation.

Thank you for taking action, though I still believe the experience should not have happened in the first place for a five-star property.

I was truly impressed by the service and the warm smiles of the staff here.
Even though the weather wasn't ideal, the delicious food and drinks totally made up for it.
They also have great shisha definitely worth trying  and the DJ played such fun music
Thanks for a lovely experience!

places.address: 33, 1 Patong Beach Shortcut Road, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Chang Wat Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Kaab Gluay is a well-established restaurant situated on Phrabarami Road in the northern area of Patong Beach. This bustling roadside eatery offers a wide range of authentic Thai favorites at affordable prices, available until late at night. The menu features over 30 variations of spicy Thai salads, red-curry prawns, classic noodles, and stir-fries. Locals and visitors alike appreciate the excellent service and reasonably priced delicious Thai dishes offered here.

sources.shortName: 10 Romantic Things To Do In Patong For Your Awesome Honeymoon - Updated 2025

places.name: Kaab Gluay

reviews.text:
I had a great time and dinner at this restaurant-it has a very relaxing vibe. A big kudos to the security guard at the front gate for helping everyone cross the road. The traffic was hectic and honestly a bit scary, so their assistance was much appreciated.

We ordered three dishes and two drinks, and everything was delicious. The coconut juice was especially amazing-fresh and refreshing! The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful, even when dealing with some rude tourists who were completely out of line. They handled it with professionalism, which I really respect.

Overall, it was a fantastic experience, and I'd definitely come back for another dinner. Highly recommend!

The waitresses were not friendly during my visit to the restaurant. Although they acknowledged my presence when I entered, nobody welcomed me. I experienced long waits for both ordering and billing. As for the food, it was of average taste, and the prices were reasonable.

Excellent food and service here! A little warm but that didn't bother us. We got chicken pad Thai, chicken with cashew nuts, spring rolls, shrimp balls and pineapple fried rice. All for 850 baht! It's right next to the street and it is very noisy so it can be difficult to talk but the vibe was cool.

places.address: 58/3 Phrabaramee Rd, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: L'Ar√¥me by the Sea is a contemporary French restaurant located at Kalim Bay in Phuket. The restaurant boasts an elegant minimalist design with two distinct areas: a dining room showcasing the art and delicacy of contemporary French cuisine with a Swiss Alps influence, and a sunset deck offering unobstructed views for enjoying pre-dinner cocktails.

sources.snippet: L‚ÄôArome by the Sea is an excellent choice for a romantic dinner in Phuket. The restaurant‚Äôs beautiful beachfront location and elegant decor create a romantic atmosphere that is perfect for couples. The outdoor terrace, in particular, is a popular spot for couples looking for a romantic dinner with a stunning ocean view.
sources.shortName: 14 Romantic Restaurants in Phuket [2025 List]

sources.snippet: L‚ÄôAr√¥me by the Sea is a restaurant with an amazing sea view, serving excellent modern French cuisine in Kalim Beach. Chef Yannick Hollenstein proposes a 5 or 7-course menu with beautifully presented dishes and surprising compositions in a perfectly balanced menu. L‚ÄôAr√¥me by the Sea has been listed in the Michelin 2023.
sources.shortName: 18 Best Romantic Restaurants in Phuket for Valentine's Day ‚ù§Ô∏è

sources.snippet: Address:247, Phrabaramee Road, Pa Tong, Amphoe Kathu, Chang Wat Phuket 83150. Contact Number: +66 (0)65 239 2111. Open Hours: 4 PM ‚Äì 11 PM (Daily)
sources.shortName: The 15 Most Romantic Dinner Spots in Phuket

places.name: L'Ar√¥me by the sea

reviews.text: It's a beachfront restaurant that gives an unforgettable atmosphere. I highly recommended to arrive before sunset. While the prices are on the higher side, but the experience is absolutely worth it. Every dish has an amazing taste and beautifully presented. Whether you're here for a romantic dinner or a special celebration, you won't be disappointed!

Paradise on earth. Overlooking the Andaman Sea. From the moment we stepped in, dining at your oceanfront restaurant was an unforgettable experience. Chef Maxs's culinary creations were nothing short of spectacular-every dish was fresh, flavorful, and artfully presented, perfectly complementing the stunning seaside view. A special thank you to Floor Manager Tucky, whose warm hospitality and seamless coordination made the service feel effortless and welcoming. Together, they've created a dining experience that truly stands out. Bravo to the entire team!

From the moment I stepped into the restaurant I was enveloped in an atmosphere of understated elegance and warm hospitality. The service was impeccable-attentive without being overbearing, and the staff went out of their way to make the evening feel special.

The food was beautifully presented and executed with precision. Each dish showcased high-quality ingredients and thoughtful flavor combinations. While not every plate was revolutionary, the overall execution was consistently strong, making for a very satisfying dining experience.

What truly stood out was the genuine sweetness of the service. Little touches-like remembering I was with child or checking in just at the right moment-made the evening feel personalized and memorable.

It delivers a polished, enjoyable fine dining experience with heart. Highly recommended for a special night out.

Malfi and the team were amazing, very personable and made us feel so welcome.

places.address: 247, 5 Phrabaramee Rd, Pa Tong, Amphoe Kathu, Chang Wat Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Meg Khram, the Sunshine & Submarine 223 Bar is a luxurious Thai restaurant located at the northern end of Patong Beach. It boasts an elegant bar area with a DJ and saxophone player creating a pleasant atmosphere without being overwhelming. The restaurant offers stunning views of the Andaman Sea, making it an ideal spot to enjoy the sunset. The service is top-notch, and while the menu caters to tourists, authentic Thai dishes can be prepared upon request.

sources.snippet: A beautiful restaurant with a modern interior and a picturesque view of the sunset. The place offers a stunning panorama of Patong Beach as well as the neighboring Sea Salt beach. Meg Khram the Sunshine & Submarine 223 Bar is suitable for family dinners and romantic dates as well as...
sources.shortName: The best places of the Patong district in Phuket: what to visit

places.name: Meg Khram the Sunshine & Submarine 223 Bar

reviews.text:
Food Quality:
The food at Mag khram Phuket was exceptional. Each dish was prepared with fresh ingredients, and the flavors were well-balanced. I particularly enjoyed the [specific dish], which was both flavorful and satisfying. The chef's attention to detail really shines through in each plate.

Presentation:
The presentation of the dishes was impressive. For instance, the mixed platter was beautifully arranged, showcasing vibrant colors and garnishes that added an artistic touch. It was evident that a lot of thought went into making the food visually appealing.

Service:
The staff at Mag khram Phuket were friendly and attentive specially Poo &besty& Nee . Our server was knowledgeable about the menu and offered great recommendations. The service was prompt, and our orders were taken care of in a timely manner, enhancing the overall dining experience.

Overall Experience
My experience at  Mag khram Phuket  was delightful. The combination of delicious food, excellent service, and a pleasant atmosphere made for a memorable meal. I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking to enjoy a great dining experience.

Absolutely stunning spot for a sunset meal by the sea üåäüåäüåÖ!

The views are breathtaking-golden skies and a refreshing sea breeze that makes the entire experience unforgettable. We loved every dish we ordered. The seafood ü¶ûü¶ê , in particular, was fresh, flavorful, and perfectly cooked.

The atmosphere is beautiful , the service is warm, and the food is absolutely delicious. Highly recommended for anyone visiting Patong Beach!

They have fixed dining times and they get REALLY full. It is better to book a table in advance.

Meg Khram in Phuket truly exceeded expectations. The papaya salad was absolutely amazing-bursting with flavor. Both the shrimp and steaks were cooked to perfection, and the variety of wines and beverages really elevated the meal. Their signature cocktails were also a highlight! The manager was such a kind and attentive lady, helping us find the perfect table with a beautiful sea view. The entire staff was incredibly friendly and professional, making our dining experience unforgettable. Hands down, the best restaurant with a stunning sea view in Phuket. I can't wait to visit again next time I'm in town!

places.address: 7¬∞54'26.3"N 98¬∞17'48.7"E, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Located in Patong Beach, Le V restaurant is a European dining spot that not only offers delectable cuisine but also boasts some of the most stunning views in the area. The chef, Alain, serves up perfectly prepared dishes such as lamb and filet accompanied by sides like potato gratin and ratatouille. To top it off, their desserts including lemon tart, chocolate fondant, and sorbet are simply irresistible.

sources.snippet: Stunning view restaurant with exclusive Versace furniture and a beautiful view of the city from the terrace. The service is top notch ‚Äì the staff is very attentive and friendly. The cuisine here is excellent ‚Äì French and exquisite.
sources.shortName: The best places of the Patong district in Phuket: what to visit

places.name: Le V Restaurant Patong

reviews.text: I took part in a fine dining event and I was pleasantly impressed by Le V restaurant. The quality of the food was superb, and I truly appreciated the excellence of the ingredients (caviar, lobster, and wagyu), the presentation, and the pairings offered, wine included. An evening to remember. Top-level service, refined decor, and one of the most beautiful views of Patong. I will definitely return to discover more.

Good food but very pricey. Maybe it's reasonable, since the credibility of the chef, but I guess I was expecting a little more.

Nice cozy place with a beautiful view. The maintenance of the place felt a bit lacking though.

We had their 5-course chefs choice. The wine was overpriced in our opinion though. The cocktails were good.

I forgot to take some picture before I ate it, sorry about that.

Had a fantastic dining experience at Le V Restaurant! The food was amazing, with flavors that truly impressed, and the portion sizes left us with full bellies and happy faces. The service was outstanding-the staff were incredibly friendly and accommodating, making sure we were well taken care of throughout the meal. The view from the restaurant added to the overall ambiance, making it a perfect spot for a great meal. Great value for money, and we'll definitely be coming back. Highly recommend!

places.address: 206 Phrabaramee Rd, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Patong Boxing Stadium Sainamyen is a small arena in Patong Beach that hosts Muay Thai boxing matches every Wednesday, Friday, and Sunday. The stadium offers an excellent experience for those interested in watching real boxing fights. It features high-level fighters, making it a great place for advanced individuals seeking good sparring opportunities. Additionally, there is a training gym and a shop selling boxing gear on-site.

sources.snippet: Patong Boxing Stadium is a renowned venue for the exciting and physically demanding sport of Muay Thai, often referred to as "the art of eight limbs." Situated in the heart of Patong, this stadium is a focal point for both local and international visitors looking to witness or participate in this centuries-old martial art.
sources.shortName: 17 Things to do in Patong

sources.snippet: If you are looking for an action-packed evening in Thailand, then Patong Boxing Stadium is perfect for you. You can get the opportunity to see the battle of female and male boxers at the biggest Muay ring in Thailand. The stadium offers a variety of seats from ringside to VIP boxes to choose from.
sources.shortName: 15 Places to Visit Near Patong Beach For A Fun Filled Vacation!
10 Romantic Things To Do In Patong For Your Awesome Honeymoon - Updated 2025

places.name: Patong Boxing Stadium Sainamyen

reviews.text:
SO GOOD! Highly Recommend This Boxing Experience

I had such an amazing time at the boxing match last night - seriously one of the most entertaining events I've been to in a while. The whole night was well-organized, super professional, and the stadium itself was absolutely beautiful.

We sat in the VIP section, and let me tell you - it was worth every penny. The seats were incredibly comfortable, the views were amazing, and the staff was super attentive the entire night. Everything felt elevated.

The crowd energy was great, very positive and in good spirits - no rowdiness, just good vibes all around. Restrooms were clean, and there were tons of snack and drink options, which made the whole experience even better.

If you're even slightly into boxing or just want a fun, lively night out, this is a MUST. Can't wait to go again!

Patong Stadium is a fantastic place to experience authentic Muay Thai, where locals and visitors from around the world come to compete. I've competed there and also enjoyed watching the fights as a spectator, and both experiences were incredible. The atmosphere is electric, and the fights are always top-notch, with indoor air conditioning keeping things comfortable. On select nights, they host an exciting lineup of MMA, kickboxing, and Muay Thai all in one event! Plus, they have a YouTube channel-Patong Boxing Stadium Sainamyen Rd.-where you can relive past fights and watch live events. It's truly an unforgettable experience!

I completely disagree with the rave reviews about this boxing! The event is, at best, a one-time experience, and even that's a stretch. Out of all the fights, maybe two were interesting, the rest were a dreary and sluggish waste of time. VIP tickets get you... a synthetic t-shirt, seriously? And the beer inside is 150 baht for 0.33! Just highway robbery! But the cherry on top was the scam with the change. We gave a guy 200 baht for a beer, he promised to come back with 50 baht in change, and simply vanished! No matter how many times we tried to catch him, he pretended not to understand English and denied selling us anything. It's a complete rip-off! I request that this employee be dealt with. There's advertising for this boxing all over Patong, but in reality, the event turned out to be extremely uninteresting. And the most unpleasant thing is the blatant dishonesty. There's no air conditioning inside, only fans pointed at the VIP area, which clearly aren't doing the job. As a result, in an arena with several hundred people, there's simply not enough air to breathe, and oxygen is critically lacking! A terrible experience!

places.address: 2, 59 Sainamyen Rd, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: If you're in Patong, don't miss the chance to witness a live Muay Thai match, Thailand's national sport. The pre-match rituals and the vibrant atmosphere of the stadiums make it an unforgettable experience. Chanrit Muaythai Gym in Patong stands out for its exceptional instructors and genuine hospitality. Visitors have raved about the warm welcome, delicious food, and even a cute cat on-site.

sources.snippet: Going to see Thai boxing together can end your night with a little exhilaration. If you‚Äôve ever dipped into the world of martial arts, you would have heard of Muay Thai. There are two main stadiums to check out for these thrilling events: Patong and Bangla boxing stadium.
sources.shortName: What to Do On Your Honeymoon in Patong

places.name: Chanrit Muay Thai Gym

reviews.text:
Thanks a million to all Chanrit members!
We had an amazing training experience!  Trainers were supportive, kind, patient, respectful and above all things we could feel that they love what they do and they are more than willing to teach with the same determination to all levels of students.
Physically strenuous, with lots of technical, strength, sparring and fighting exercises, true martial arts training.
Our training partners were also respectful and friendly, but serious regarding the techniques practiced and what we've learned in the class.
We'll try to come back on our next trip!
Keep up the hard work!

I've trained all over Phuket and Chanrit has been my favorite gym. All of the trainers are awesome, funny, patient and always willing to help the new guy/girl. I even stayed in Patong an extra few days just to train here. If you're looking to take your training/technique to the next level come train at Chanrit.

The best white team I can ever find in Phuket . This is the place where you can actually come here and then spend a time or two days whenever you have time just to learn about Muay Thai and this is the best Muaythai ever don't forget to come here cause the trainer are super professional, and they are ex fighter

places.address: 188, 2 Sawatdirak Rd, Tambon Patong, Patong, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Tri Trang Beach is a hidden gem in Patong, Phuket, offering a serene and secluded atmosphere for those seeking to escape the hustle and bustle of city life. With its white sandy shores and clear waters, it's an ideal spot for nature lovers and peace-seekers. The 500-meter long beach provides ample space for sunbathing and relaxation.
places.name: Tri Trang Beach

reviews.text: Very nice little beach on the opposite side of the bay from Patong Beach. A less touristy beach but well worth a visit. The area around the Hide Out Restaurant is very good for swimming. Also by the Tri Trang Beach sign, a couple of hundred metres up from the Marriott, there is a shallow area where a lot of Thais go swimming. Numerous restaurants dotted around Tri Trang, most of them located up the hill past the Marriott.

Very cozy, beautiful and comfortable beach is a good place to relax! Its coastline stretches for a distance of about 730 meters - it is a medium-sized beach.

You can find a place in the shade - here they left a casuarina forest belt, which throws natural shade on the beach.

There are no sun beds and umbrellas, which would be available for rent. But there are swings and a local attraction - an elephant, with which you can swim in the sea. Therefore, it will be interesting and fun for both adults and children!

The entrance to the sea is very comfortable, the depth is average, the water is transparent. Here there are no low tides (watch the tides in the appendix) and you can swim all day long. The beach is notable for the fact that you can swim here in the rainy season, this is due to the fact that there is a reef, which dampens the waves before they come to the shore.

Full information with video and easy navigation - in the app üëâ PHUKETON
Quite and peaceful place and so beautiful when it's sunny not too far from resorts and shops

places.address: Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Bangla Road is the pulsating heart of nightlife in Patong, Phuket, where excitement and energy collide. This lively thoroughfare is lined with an array of bars, clubs, and market stalls that come alive after dark. As you stroll down Bangla Road, you'll encounter a vibrant mix of Go-Go bars and pubs filled with friendly locals and travelers alike. The atmosphere is electric, inviting you to dance the night away or simply enjoy a drink while soaking in the sights and sounds around you.

sources.shortName: 10 Romantic Things To Do In Patong For Your Awesome Honeymoon - Updated 2025

places.name: Bangla Rd

reviews.text: Beautiful place. good night life. Clubs drinks dance n many more.

Nice place to visit. Many hookers, night clubs, prostitutes, bars, live music and weed shops. Nice place to go around and see some of the craziness that happens around without actually been part of it. Whatever you are looking for, you will found it here.

Not for me , very noisy and loud crowds.
A lot of bars and ladies who offer you whatever you desired.

places.address: Tambon Patong, Amphoe Kathu, Chang Wat Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Perched atop the Hilltop Hotel Phuket, Plearn Restaurant offers breathtaking panoramic views of Phuket Town and Phang Nga Bay. The restaurant is renowned for its exceptional breakfast, lunch, and dinner options. Guests praise the friendly staff and commend the chef's culinary skills, as every dish is not only visually appealing but also delectable. The lovely atmosphere adds to an enjoyable dining experience, making it a must-visit spot for food enthusiasts seeking great food with a view.

sources.snippet: Plearn is a popular dining spot in Phuket, Thailand that offers a romantic atmosphere, delicious cuisine, and beautiful sea views. The restaurant is situated in a stunning location overlooking the Andaman Sea and serves a variety of dishes that are inspired by Thai, European, and fusion cuisine. The restaurant‚Äôs interior is decorated in a modern style, with elegant lighting and a comfortable seating arrangement that is perfect for couples looking for a romantic dinner.
sources.shortName: 14 Romantic Restaurants in Phuket [2025 List]

places.name: PLEARN RESTAURANT

reviews.text:
I've been eating at Plearn Restaurant during my stay at Hilltop Resort, and I can't say enough good things about it. The food has been absolutely phenomenal-everything I've tried has been fresh, flavorful, and clearly made with care.

What makes the experience even better is the service. The staff are genuinely warm and welcoming, always greeting you with a smile and making you feel right at home.

I've had the chance to try a variety of their dishes, and every single meal has been top notch. If you're staying in the area (or even if you're not!), make sure to eat here. You won't be disappointed.

Returned again to Hilltop Wellness Resort for a Yoga and Wellness package and meals were included in this restaurant at the hotel. Service is great at the restaurant (and resort) and food is healthy and wholesome. There's a good selection of western and local dishes as well. Nice ambience too!

I visited this restaurant on my birthday, and it was truly a special experience! The staff surprised me with beautiful decorations and made my day unforgettable. The atmosphere was cozy, and the service was warm and attentive.
What stood out the most was the dessert - absolutely delicious! I tried the [e.g., mango sticky rice], and it was one of the best I've ever had üòç
Thank you to the amazing team for making my birthday so memorable. Highly recommended to anyone visiting Thailand! üåüüéâ

places.generalDescription: The G Beach Club is a serene hideaway located near Patong Beach, offering a tranquil escape from the bustling areas of Phuket. Situated on a private beach strip, it boasts stunning views and friendly owners. The club emphasizes sustainability and provides international cuisine in a lush setting. Visitors can enjoy VIP access at an affordable price and indulge in delicious food while taking in the beautiful sea views.

sources.snippet: It‚Äôs amazing that this close to the busy and crowded Patong there is such a quiet and peaceful place. There are very few people and everything on the territory is thoughtfully designed for relaxation and comfortable rest. There are locations for...
sources.shortName: The best places of the Patong district in Phuket: what to visit

places.name: The G Beach Club

reviews.text: Spent the day diving at the private beach here. Great location with a private beach and chilled vibes. Staff are so helpful and friendly. Food was super tasty and great selection of freshly brewed coffee also. After diving, spent another couple of hours relaxing there and swimming in the beach. Lots of fish swimming by the shore so don't forget your goggles! They also provide snorkel rental which is handy. Thanks for a great day.

Amazing place! Delicious food, a romantic atmosphere, and even its own diving school. A huge thank you to Andrea for his professionalism and caring nature ‚Äì thanks to him, my first diving experience was a success. I highly recommend this place to everyone!
It's amazing hidden and chilled beach club. Not a lux vibe one but perfectly private and beautiful. Very good service, food and beverage. Will definitely come back.

places.address: Tambon Patong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: La Gritta, located in Patong Beach at Amari Coral Beach, offers an elegant dining experience with a wide-ranging modern Italian menu. The restaurant's seafront setting provides breathtaking views and warm tropical breezes under a starry night sky. From antipasti and Italian meats to pastas and pizza, La Gritta's menu will transport you to the picture-perfect island of Capri.

sources.snippet: If you‚Äôre staying in the heart of Patong you may think that you need to travel outside the town in order to find a nice romantic restaurant for Valentine‚Äôs Day. But La Gritta proves you wrong ‚Äì located at the Amari Coral Beach Resort, the restaurant has a lovely setting with fine views over the whole of Patong bay, plus a wide range of excellent Italian dishes. The price is not bad, either, so this is a good option for when you want to impress someone but you can‚Äôt afford to spend a fortune.
sources.shortName: Celebrate Valentine‚Äôs Day in Phuket: 9 Romantic Restaurants

sources.snippet: La Gritta is an Italian restaurant located in the Amari Phuket resort on Patong Beach. It offers a stunning panoramic view of the Andaman Sea, which creates a romantic and cozy atmosphere, making it an ideal choice for couples looking for a romantic dinner. The restaurant features an elegant indoor dining area and a spacious outdoor terrace with a beautiful view of the sea.
sources.shortName: 14 Romantic Restaurants in Phuket [2025 List]

sources.snippet: Who said there were no romantic restaurants in Patong Beach?. La Gritta at Amari Phuket at the southern end of Patong has a unique view of the entire Patong bay, perfect for a date. Add excellent Italian cuisine at a good price, and you get yourself a perfect romantic evening and amazing photos to take back home.
sources.shortName: 18 Best Romantic Restaurants in Phuket for Valentine's Day ‚ù§Ô∏è

sources.snippet: Savour quality ingredients from local and Italian farms and ocean-to-table producers. This traditional restaurant serves Italian specialities, gourmet pizzas, pasta and delectable desserts. Cuisine: ItalianOpening Hours: 12:00 to 22:30Location: Ocean Front Wing
sources.shortName: 5-Star Resort on Patong Beach Dining

sources.snippet: Address:Amari, 2, Muen-ngern Road Beach, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150. Contact Number: 076 340 112. Open Hours: 10 AM ‚Äì 12 MN (Daily)
sources.shortName: The 15 Most Romantic Dinner Spots in Phuket

places.name: La Gritta

reviews.text: In one word, it is truly magnificent. We chose it for our anniversary and we were very pleased. Ms. Namcha was very attentive and provided good service. You can make a reservation without thinking, the kitchen chefs, everything is great. Especially the pizza and pasta are amazing. Thank you very much.

We went as a couple Monday night 10/3. Our reservation was for 6.30 pm as i wanted to see the sunset whilst eating. We didn't see the sunset due to position of the dining area but the views were amazing nonetheless. The food and service was good. They charge an extra 17% on the total bill for service and vat. For drinks 1 starter shared mains and a side of spinach it came to ¬£94. This is pricey for Thailand, but was worth a trip to the Amari hotel to enjoy.

Went there during my holidays to surprise my partner. In general, vibes were nice but sadly there wasnt any sunset at this area. Dining next to the beach was therapeutic and the view was definitely a great bonus.

Getting hold on the service staff was really difficult even though it was just a few tables. Not sure if there is anyone that was suppose to station outside as half of the time they were inside the restaurant. Food was slightly above average I would say. We sat there pretty long and the complimentary bread came quite awhile later. We didnt even receive any olive oil or vinaigrette to pair the bread with (we were suppose to receive it).

I had the magherita which was okay. Wouldnt say it's super authentic, but I do still enjoy it. Had the bruschetta classica, tomatoes were fresh and thats about it. Should have ordered something with cheese on it that could elevate the dish a little bit. For pasta wise, I had the ravioli al granchio. The dish that stood out to me and I do enjoy every bite of it. It was full of crab and it was not too heavy on the palate. It was done really well. I also had the mafaldine, this was pretty much basic with just tomato base and lobster. Pasta was al dente and it tasted pretty much 1 dimension. Had tiramisu afterwards and this is not bad. However the cream layer on top is a little bit too much and didnt feel like the whole dish was balanced out. But other than that, it was creamy and rich.

Only giving a 4 star due to lack of service and attention. Could work on it. :)

places.address: Amari, 2 Muen-ngern Road Beach, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Sea Salt Lounge & Grill is a charming restaurant and seaside bar located in Patong Beach, part of the renowned Diamond Cliff Resort. Nestled on a rocky beach in Kalim, it offers stunning views of Patong Bay. Despite its prime location near the bustling Patong Beach, this hidden gem exudes a laid-back vibe and serves a diverse international menu to cater to all tastes.

sources.snippet: SeaSalt Lounge and Grill is a beautiful new restaurant as well as a lounge built on a prime seafront location in Patong Beach. SeaSalt is also part of the well-known Diamond Cliff Resort. If you are a little familiar with Patong beach, SeaSalt is just outside Patong Beach on the way to Kalim Beach and Kamala Beach.
sources.shortName: 18 Best Romantic Restaurants in Phuket for Valentine's Day ‚ù§Ô∏è

sources.snippet: Address:225, Phrabaramee Road, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150. Contact Number: +66 (0)65 239 2111. Open Hours: 11 AM ‚Äì 12 MN (Daily)
sources.shortName: The 15 Most Romantic Dinner Spots in Phuket

places.name: Sea Salt Lounge & Grill

reviews.text:
We held our wedding at Sea Salt Lounge & Grill and we honestly couldn't be happier with how our day went.

The setting is incredible as it looks out over into the sea. We chose this location as although it is close to the town of Patong meaning everything is accessible, the hotel and restaurant feels very private and secluded.

Our wedding package included many amenities and personal touches that made it so special. The service we received from all staff throughout our stay and on our wedding day was absolutely incredible. They could not have done any more for us. Special thanks to Bright who co-ordinated our wedding and did an amazing job.

The food from the Lounge & Grill was beautiful. We were able to amend our menu to our taste and were able to offer a wide selection for our guests, all of which was cooked to perfection and tasted great. We also had an open bar for guests and the staff were very efficient and ensured no glass remained empty throughout the day.

Me and wife and our family would like to thank all the staff of Diamond Cliff Resort and Sea Salt Lounge & Grill for helping make the best day of our lives so special. We look forward to returning here for many years to come to remind us of our wedding day.

I highly recommend this venue for anyone looking to hold a wedding in Phuket.

Visited this restaurant twice during my stay. The place has beautiful views, neatly arranged tables, and a calm, pleasant atmosphere - especially lovely at sunset.

The first time we came, the sunset-view tables were all reserved. On our second visit, we got lucky and managed to get one without a booking. Both times, the restaurant wasn't crowded, which made the experience feel peaceful.

The food was tasty. I had a non-alcoholic cocktail on the first visit (really nice) and a cup of coffee on the second - that one was more of a ‚Äúnot great, not terrible‚Äù kind of thing.

That said, nothing really stood out as exceptional, especially considering the high prices. The food was solid, but the service felt average at best. One of the waitresses seemed quite unhappy during both visits. Not outright rude, but noticeably unfriendly.

I'd still recommend this place - either solo or with a partner - for watching the sunset, enjoying a drink, or simply relaxing over a quiet meal. Just don't expect anything extraordinary, and be prepared for a few unfriendly faces among the staff.

impressed from the view to the food!
We came for the Sunbay Brunch on Sunday, and the seaside atmosphere was absolutely beautiful. Cool breeze, full ocean view - perfect for a relaxing weekend.

The food selection was wide and top quality - fresh seafood, delicious oysters, melt-in-your-mouth sashimi, and perfectly grilled BBQ. Everything was beautifully presented and very tasty. Staff were friendly, smiling, and kept everything replenished without us having to ask.

There are different seating zones to suit couples, families, or groups of friends.
If you're looking for a premium brunch spot in Phuket with great vibes and great food, I highly recommend this place.

üìå Tip: Make a reservation in advance - it gets busy!

places.address: 225 Phrabaramee Rd, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Ta Khai, located within the Trisara Resort in Phuket, offers a charming and rustic dining experience with a focus on seafood made from fresh local ingredients. The restaurant's name means 'fishing net', reflecting its emphasis on seafood dishes. The menu features flavorful dishes with slightly toned-down spicing for Western palates, and two set menus provide a variety of options to try. Guests can enjoy the beautiful setting and terrace seating while savoring authentic Thai cuisine.

sources.snippet: A post shared by to Eat | to Share | to Travel (@top25restaurants). Media from takhairestaurant. Address:88/28 Muen-Ngern Road, Tri Trang Beach, Patong
sources.shortName: The 15 Most Romantic Dinner Spots in Phuket

places.name: Ta Khai

reviews.text:
If you're looking for more than just a meal - if you're after a full experience, especially for a romantic celebration - this is the place to be.

My partner and I are a couple who truly enjoy food and discovering new flavors. In other words, we know a thing or two about good dining. Before coming to Phuket, I had made a long list of restaurants from the Michelin Guide, and while this place was on the list, it hadn't received as much praise as some others. So we weren't sure what to expect - but we were pleasantly surprised!

From the moment we arrived, it was exactly the kind of atmosphere I had imagined from Phuket. A truly special experience from the very beginning. We let the staff guide us through the menu and followed their recommendations - and we're so glad we did.

The service, the ambiance, the food, the cocktails - everything was outstanding and worked together beautifully. We're grateful to the team for giving us such a memorable evening. Thank you for making our experience so special!

The best restaurant we have ever eaten at, by far. Every dish was 10/10 and the mango sticky rice was out of this world. Cocktails were based on Thai cuisine and were delicious. They were able to curate a separate vegetarian fixed menu just for me upon asking. Recommend to anyone visiting Phuket. This is a must visit restaurant.

Obsessed with this place!!! Such an amazing menu with fresh ingredients. Paul was the best waiter. He was so kind and made sure we had the best experience. Highly recommend this spot. Great green curry, tom yum soup, and mango sticky rice.

places.address: 88/28, 88/30-30, Muen-Ngern Rd In Rosewood, Muen-Ngern Rd, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Nestled in the vibrant area of Patong, Simon Cabaret Phuket is a must-see destination for anyone looking to experience an unforgettable night out. This renowned cabaret showcases stunning performances by talented ladyboy artists adorned in dazzling costumes and elaborate headdresses that captivate audiences with their charm and artistry. With three spectacular shows each evening at 6 pm, 7 pm, and 9 pm, visitors are treated to a visual feast that celebrates beauty and talent in an intimate theater setting.

sources.snippet: Simon Cabaret is located at 8 Sirirat Road in Phuket, Thailand. It is an intimate theatre which offers live cabaret shows by dancers in sparkly attire and head-dresses. Established in 1991, Simon Cabaret has a jaw-dropping stage design with hi-tech sound system and lighting equipment.
sources.shortName: 17 Things to do in Patong
10 Romantic Things To Do In Patong For Your Awesome Honeymoon - Updated 2025

places.name: Simon Cabaret Phuket

reviews.text:
Really welcoming experience, the bar service behind. The red rope was superb, beautiful room and prompt friendly service.

Fantastic show, amazing dancing amazing outfits and Amazing sets. I'm a big sound guy and it's the best theatre sound system I've heard in years. Thai, American, comedy, something for everyone. My favourite number was the Bollywood extravaganza. Just wow. Loved the exquisite hand control of all the 'female' lead dancers.

I'd heartily recommend, but watch out for the 200baht per person per photo charge at the line up. Have one photo with two people and its 400 baht (¬£10 or 14USD), so that can easily rack up a big bill given a cast of 100s. Just walk past if you don't want to pay.

My video is of the pre show in the lobby. Video is not allowed in the show itself.

Really enjoyed this experience. I would highly recommend. Very cultural experience. This is a must do when in Thailand. Very good show. Very good value, spent less than ¬£15 through Agoda. I love the gay pride in Thailand so accepting

Very good show! Mostly features transgender stars who sing live. The costumes are beautiful and the performance is great. After the show, the performers come out and you can take photos with them for a tip.

places.address: 8 Sirirat Rd, Pa Tong, Kathu District, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Sizzle Rooftop Restaurant is a perfect choice for those who love grilled dishes. The menu offers a wide variety of steaks, including beef tenderloin and beef strip loin, as well as Kurobuta pork chops, grill-roasted chicken, and seafood items. The restaurant also boasts an impressive selection of mid-priced and premium wines from around the world.

sources.snippet: Sizzle, Patong | Credit: Avista Hideaway Phuket Patong mgallery by sofitel. This delightful al fresco eatery is sitting at the highest point of Avista Hideaway Phuket Patong Mgallery by Sofitel and is famous for its BBQ prime meats and grilling fresh seafood in a luxury scenic setting‚Ä¶ read more
sources.shortName: 14 Most Romantic Restaurants & Bars in Phuket

sources.snippet: A post shared by Sizzle Rooftop Bar & Restaurant (@sizzlerooftopphuket). Media from sizzlerooftopphuket. Address:39/9, Muen Ngern Road, Tri Trang Beach, Patong, Phuket
sources.shortName: The 15 Most Romantic Dinner Spots in Phuket

places.name: Sizzle Rooftop Restaurant

reviews.text:
I recently celebrated my birthday dinner at Sizzle, and it was an unforgettable experience! From the moment my guests and I arrived at the restaurant, the team greeted us with warm smiles and exceptional hospitality, making us feel special right away.

Food was absolutely delicious! We had lobster and a variety of entrees. Each dish was expertly prepared and presented, contributing to the overall wonderful experience.

I want to extend a special thank you to Francisco and the entire Sizzle team for their thoughtful birthday song with live guitar and soap bubbles.

Their attention to detail and dedication to making my celebration truly memorable made my day all the more special. Because of this fantastic experience, I know I will definitely be returning to Sizzle in the future!

Had dinner at Sizzle Rooftop on the weekend and was really impressed. The food was top quality, everything tasted great and was beautifully presented. The view is stunning ‚Äì especially at sunset if the sky is clear. The staff were friendly, service was quick and attentive. Special thanks to Mam for her outstanding cocktails ‚Äì every drink was perfectly mixed and full of flavor. Prices are fair for the level of quality. Definitely recommend!

‚ú®¬†A Truly Unforgettable Experience at Sizzle Rooftop Bar¬†‚ú®

From the moment we arrived at¬†Sizzle Rooftop Bar, we were warmly welcomed. The¬†customer service was absolutely exceptional, every staff member was attentive, friendly, and genuinely passionate about creating a wonderful dining experience. A¬†special thank you to Francis and Patric, whose warmth, professionalism, and attention to detail truly made our night extra memorable.

The¬†food was nothing short of phenomenal. Each dish was perfectly prepared, bursting with flavor, and beautifully presented.

And the¬†view? Simply breathtaking.¬†Watching the¬†sunset from the rooftop¬†was pure magic. The sky transformed into a canvas,an awe inspiring backdrop that added so much romance and charm to the evening.

Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or just want to treat yourself,¬†Sizzle is the perfect place for a luxurious, unforgettable night out. The combination of excellent service, exquisite food, and a stunning sunset view makes it one of the most¬†captivating dining experiences in Phuket.

Highly recommended-we'll definitely be back! üåÖüç∑üí´

places.address: Beach, 39/9 Muen-Ngern Rd, Tambon Patong, Amphoe Kathu, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Perched on a hilltop in Patong, Le Versace Lounge Rooftop is an acclaimed restaurant renowned for its French haute cuisine and breathtaking panoramic views. The venue offers an exquisite interior and outdoor terrace where guests can savor fine dining while taking in the stunning sunset and city lights below. Whether it's a special occasion or simply to enjoy a memorable meal, this long-standing establishment promises an unforgettable experience.

sources.snippet: If you think to have fine French dining at a rooftop restaurant with an exotic sunset view, Le Versace is the best pick. Another fun way is by soaking in a seaside pool and sipping a bottle of Thai beer.
sources.shortName: 10 Romantic Things To Do In Patong For Your Awesome Honeymoon - Updated 2025

places.name: Le Versace Lounge Rooftop

reviews.text: Professional service, delicious food and incredible view. The other face of Patang. We recommend it, my wife and I will be back!

Le Versace was perfect for a romantic night out with my girlfriend! Stunning views overlooking all Patong Bay, delicious food, and excellent service made it an unforgettable experience. Highly recommend!

Beautiful spot, the view is amazing and they gave us amuse bouche's gratis, with our cocktails, the staff are very friendly and the food was brilliant, it is so good we are coming back on Thursday for dinner.

places.address: 206/5-6 Prabaramee Rd Beach GPS: 07.9061, 98, 3016, Pa Tong, patong, Phuket 83150, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Beach Restaurant by The Surin Phuket is a fantastic Thai restaurant with excellent food and great and friendly service. It has an authentic Thai atmosphere and is perfect for enjoying a meal on the beach.

sources.snippet: The restaurant not only has a wonderful atmosphere ‚Äì think a spacious beachfront lawn with dining and seating serenaded by the soothing waves ‚Äì but also has a sophisticated romantic dinner featuring Thai cuisine and fresh grilled seafood. It is also a popular venue for small and intimate weddings‚Ä¶ read more
sources.shortName: 14 Most Romantic Restaurants & Bars in Phuket

sources.snippet: A post shared by Beachrestaurant Thesurinphuket (@beachrestaurantthesurinphuket). Media from beachrestaurantthesurinphuket. Address:118, Moo 3 Soi Hat Surin 8 Choeng Thale, Thalang District, Phuket 83110
sources.shortName: The 15 Most Romantic Dinner Spots in Phuket

places.name: Beach Restaurant by The Surin Phuket

reviews.text: We read the reviews about the Thai degustation menu and of course we had to try it. Honestly the food was delicious to say the least. I find myself to be a picky eater so I was a bit scared that I wasn't gonna like most of the food, but everything on the menu was so good, I loved every single thing that they served us. It is also a lot of food and big portions, so it's more than great value for the price. The restaurant itself has a really cool and unique vibe, right by the sea, it's perfect to catch a sunset there. The staff are exceptional! All of them were so kind and attentive, always smiling and just giving us so much positive energy. A big thank you to them for the amazing experience that we had there!
Amazing dining experience, our favourite restaurant in the whole Phuket. Don't miss lamb curry with roti, steamed fish and our absolutely gem - soft shell crab soup, to die for! 5+ stars

This place is awesome, and the vibe is great. The hotel's main thing is that kaya king activity, which is supposed to be really good... I didn't try it, but I saw tons of people doing it... plus, the pool is huge, and the room view is classic üòç

places.address: 118 Moo 3 Soi Hat Surin 8, Choeng Thale, Thalang District, Phuket 83110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Orientala Spa is one of the top spas in Phuket, offering a wide range of Thai massages and spa treatments. Their skilled therapists provide affordable massage sessions lasting at least an hour, allowing visitors to relax and unwind. One of their popular offerings is a combination package including a body scrub, Thai massage, aromatherapy massage, and foot massage at a reasonable price.

sources.snippet: Orientala Spa offers both Thai aromatherapy massage and soothing reflexology for feett. Other facilities include hotel pick-up and drop-off, and complimentary refreshments.
sources.shortName: 10 Romantic Things To Do In Patong For Your Awesome Honeymoon - Updated 2025

places.name: Orientala Spa

reviews.text: I had the aroma oil & foot massages for a reasonable price. It was worth every penny. The therapist was professional and asked if I was okay with the pressure a few times. Very polite staff at the front desk. The room was clean and tidy. Highly recommend üôèüèª

We enjoyed the treatment at the spa so much that we visited the spa 2 times in our 4 day trip. The masseuses at our second session were particularly attentive and did really a really good job.
My masseuse Ploypailyn was attentive enough to notice that I had a stiff shoulder and was not able to comfortably put my arm in a particular position. She adjust it without asking. She was also very detailed with the scrubbing.
My friend masseuse Nattaya also used enough pressure when massaging her and my friend claim it was one the best massage that she ever had.

A great spa experience. They will let you fill out a form to understand your needs, during the spa, my body feels completely relaxed. Afterwards, there will be hot tea and snacks, a wonderful experience, highly recommended üòòüëç

places.address: 49, 145 Raj-U-Thid, Pa Tong, Kathu, Phuket 83150, Thailand
